title: One Piece Little Garden Arc (70-77) Review
author: dlstudios
description: A comprehensive review of the Little Garden arc (Episodes 70-77) praising it as some of the best writing in the series so far, with great character moments and balance between comedy and serious themes.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Little Garden arc

title: One Piece Volume 14: Little Garden Beyond the Battle, Between Symbolism and Esoterism
author: Antiel.ARt
description: A deep analytical piece that delves beyond the surface of the Little Garden arc, revealing and analyzing the esoteric subtexts, symbolism of duality, and hidden connections in this narrative arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Analyzes symbolism throughout the Little Garden arc

title: One Piece: Little Garden Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Editorial Team
description: A comprehensive summary and review of the Little Garden arc, praising it as highly regarded among fans for combining captivating plot, engaging action, humorous moments, and intriguing character dynamics.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full arc summary and recap with spoilers

title: The Great One Piece Journey (Part 8): Little Garden
author: Jonah (Jonah's Books & Rants)
description: Part 8 of a comprehensive One Piece journey blog series. The author calls Little Garden a rock solid arc that's a wacky and fun adventure encapsulating what they love about early One Piece.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers the entire Little Garden arc in detail

title: One Piece: Oda May Have Confirmed 2 Major Characters Dying in Elbaph After 24 Years of Foreshadowing
author: FandomWire Editorial
description: An analysis of how Dorry and Brogy's introduction in Episode 71 and the Little Garden arc may have foreshadowed their potential deaths in the Elbaph arc, examining 24 years of narrative setup.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains major manga spoilers up to the Elbaph arc

title: After 25 Years, One Piece Is Exploring Elbaph, And the Arc Will Change Everything
author: Screen Rant Editorial
description: An explainer article examining the history of Elbaph in One Piece, tracing back to its first mention in Episode 71 when Dorry and Brogy introduced the legendary land of giants.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses Elbaph arc and contains current manga spoilers
